FuncDef: The reset traffic-statistics vpn-instance command clears traffic statistics about the specified VPN instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears the traffic statistics about all VPN instances.
-

Specifies the name of a VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before collecting traffic statistics again, run the reset traffic-statistics vpn-instance command to clear the existing statistics. This helps you obtain the desired information by running the display traffic-statistics vpn-instance command.
Precautions
Statistics cannot be restored after they are cleared. Exercise caution when running the command.
